title: Foundational Training in Instructional Design and Strategy (IDS): Needs Analysis for Mathematics Education Application

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Course where adult learners (general citizens) explore IDS (Instructional Design Strategies) applications based on real-world experiences in mathematics education

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles of IDS (such as the ADDIE model) and apply them to math lesson design
Learners can perform IDS needs analysis procedures using survey tools in mobile environments
Learners can identify three IDS implementation barriers in math education settings and propose resolution strategies

resources: IDS Fundamental Principles Video Content (5-Minute Segments)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
